mainText:
I would like to believe that the value of one's life is how others will 
remember you when you are gone. In this case I applaud Steve for the 
person he was portrayed as and so highly respected by his colleagues and 
business competitors alike. My condolences to his family who surely must 
stand proud by his well doings and amazing visions that benefitted us 
all. I am a proud owner of several products he designed yet more proud 
and satisfied to have bought them from and individual such as he and the 
company that stands behind him, Apple.

He will be greatly missed yet his memories will last many lifetimes 
ahead...rest in peace.
header: In great Memory of Steve Jobs
author: Karl
